contest-event.event-date:
Sept. 16, 1978 D North East Derbyshire District Council Annual Brass Band Festival (Grade Four)
North East Derbyshire District Council Annual Brass Band Festival (Grade Four) 440 Own Choice Test Piece Contest North East Derbyshire District Council Annual Brass Band Festival dronfield-contest-fourth-section
Sports Centre, Dronfield, Derbyshire Prizes - 1st £35 and trophy, 2nd £25, 3rd £15. 20th annual contest. 8 bands competed.
Sept. 11, 2013, 10:11 p.m. March 30, 2017, 6:29 a.m.
1 Dronfield (CMW) Band Brian Bunting
2 Creswell Colliery Junior Mervyn Griffiths
3 Kirkby Colliery Welfare Band Roy Walters
4 Chesterfield & District John Lefley
Unknown Result Rivington and Adlington Band Valerie E. Roocroft
Unknown Result Houghton Main Colliery H. Hammerton
Unknown Result Pleasley Colliery Welfare Band G. Lee
Unknown Result Barrow Concert Dennis Wheeler
Withdrawn Frickley South Elmsall Band Ray White
Withdrawn Holywell Band G. Hopkins
Withdrawn Whitwell Brass Band J. D. Wheatley
